sources.name: Dept_LKP
sources.script:
source(output(
		Deptno as decimal(10,0),
		deptname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Dept_LKP

sources.name: EMP
sources.script:
source(output(
		empno as decimal(10,0),
		ename as string,
		deptno as decimal(10,0),
		sal as decimal(10,0),
		comm as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EMP

sinks.name: Tgt1
sinks.script:
FILTRANS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Tgt1

transformations.name: JNRTRANS
transformations.script:
EMP, Dept_LKP join(Dept_LKP@Deptno == EMP@deptno,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JNRTRANS

transformations.name: AGGTRANS
transformations.script:
EXPTRANS aggregate(groupBy(empno,
		Upper_ename,
		deptno = deptno,
		comm,
		deptname,
		Loc),
	max_sal = max(sal)) ~> AGGTRANS
